Row.Text: [ICON_Bullet]+100% [ICON_Production] Production towards [ICON_Unit] Naval Melee, Ranged, and Raider class Units.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 1 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]Unit Maintenance is reduced by 1 [ICON_Gold] Gold.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]-1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity in all Cities.
[ICON_Bullet]Injured [ICON_Unit] Military Unit's [ICON_Strength] Strength penalty is reduced by 50%.
[ICON_Bullet]+20% [ICON_Citizen] Growth and +4 [ICON_PressureUp] Loyalty for Cities not on your original [ICON_Capital] Capital's [ICON_Terrain] Continent.
[ICON_Bullet]+25% [ICON_Gold] Gold and +10% [ICON_Production] Production for Cities not on your original [ICON_Capital] Capital's [ICON_Terrain] Continent.

[ICON_Bullet]+40% [ICON_Production] Production towards [ICON_Science] Ancient to Future Era [ICON_DISTRICT_WONDER] Wonders.

[ICON_Bullet][ICON_DISTRICT_THEATER] Theater Square [ICON_Buildings] Buildings gain +50% [ICON_Culture] Culture if there is 1) +4 [ICON_Culture] Culture adjacency or 2) City is at 15 [ICON_Citizen] Population or over.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 3 [ICON_Gold] Gold.

[ICON_Bullet]+50% [ICON_Production] Production towards [ICON_DISTRICT_NEIGHBORHOOD] Neighborhoods and their [ICON_Buildings] Buildings.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity in all Cities.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gain 100 [ICON_Gold] Gold per level of Appeal, when replacing a [ICON_Charges] Farm with a [ICON_DISTRICT_NEIGHBORHOOD] Neighborhood.

[ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Food] Food, [ICON_Production] Production, and [ICON_Gold] Gold in all [ICON_DISTRICT_NEIGHBORHOOD] Neighborhoods; doubled in [ICON_DISTRICT_NEIGHBORHOOD] Neighborhoods with Charming Appeal; doubled again in [ICON_DISTRICT_NEIGHBORHOOD] Neighborhoods with Breathtaking appeal.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 5 [ICON_Gold] Gold.

[ICON_Bullet]+3 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities and [ICON_Housing] Housing in Cities with a [ICON_Governor] Governor that has at least 2 [ICON_Promotion] Promotions.

[ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Production] Production and City Maintenance increases by 1 [ICON_Gold] Gold in all Cities; bonus +3 [ICON_Production] Production and City Maintenance increases by 3 [ICON_Gold] Gold in Cities with 3 [ICON_District] Specialty Districts.

[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Land Melee and Anti-Cavalry class Units capture a [ICON_Charges] Prisoner of War after defeating a [ICON_Barbarian] non-Barbarian [ICON_Unit] Unit.

[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Land Melee and Anti-Cavalry class Units gain +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when attacking.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]All [ICON_Unit] Military Units gain +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against City-States and their [ICON_Unit] Units.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]-50% [ICON_Envoy] Envoy token points per turn.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 4 [ICON_Gold] Gold.

[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Land Ranged class Units gain +7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against [ICON_Unit] Land Melee and Anti-Cavalry class Units.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 5 [ICON_Gold] Gold.

[ICON_Bullet]+7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against players in a [ICON_GLORY_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age or [ICON_GLORY_SUPER_GOLDEN_AGE] Heroic Age and Free Cities.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 2 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
